name: Stealth Trucking
description:
You're a trucker trying to make your way through hostile land. Stay out of sight and make it to the end of the road without getting caught!

Controls

  • WASD - Driving
  • Space - Handbrake
  • R - Toggle Lights

This probably would've benefited from a gamma slider, but, you know, time. Hope you can see something. Might adjust if many people have problems with it.
